mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_review order by rev_num desc) a) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(rev_num, rev_title, rev_content, rev_writer, rev_pdt_name, rev_image) values (seq_rev_num.nextval, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content}, #{rev_writer}, #{rev_pdt_name}, #{rev_image})
